column4: I'm running ubuntu 9.10 and I have netgear wg311v3. I can't get it to work I have downloaded Ndiswrapper, but I am stuck, I am completely new to ubuntu, anyone know who could help me or a room i can be diected too?
just ask your question in here
just give it a little while for someone to answer
did you go to the link that PingFloyd posted? https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/Device/Netgear_WG311_v3
